feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Use a suitable data store
entry.summary: Pick the storage technology that's the best fit for how you use your data. Learn about alternatives to relational databases. Consider polyglot persistence.

entry.title: Build a relationship mesh dashboard on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to build an example workload that brings together data from various systems into a user-friendly dashboard.

entry.title: DevSecOps for infrastructure as code (IaC)
entry.summary: Learn how to use DevSecOps for IaC to securely deploy cloud infrastructure into a new Azure landing zone.

entry.title: Rehost Adabas & Natural applications on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to migrate a Software AG Adabas & Natural mainframe system to Azure by using a rehost approach.

entry.title: Mainframe modernization using Model9
entry.summary: Use Model9 solution to migrate mainframe data to the Azure cloud by using secure and expedited technology.

entry.title: Power BI data write-back with Power Apps and Power Automate
entry.summary: Learn about a solution that provides data write-back functionality for Power BI reports. Update data in Power BI and push the changes back to your data source.

entry.title: Troubleshoot network problems in AKS clusters
entry.summary: Learn about steps to take to troubleshoot network problems in Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) clusters.

entry.title: Open-source scenarios on Azure
entry.summary: Review a list of architectures and solutions that use open-source technologies.

entry.title: Enterprise infrastructure as code using Bicep and Azure Container Registry
entry.summary: Reduce repetition, model best practices, and have consistent standard deployments by modularizing your Azure Resource Manager templates.

entry.title: Apache scenarios on Azure
entry.summary: Review a list of architectures and solutions that use Apache open-source solutions.

entry.title: Refactor IBM z/TPF mainframe systems to Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to refactor IBM z/TPF mainframe systems to functionally equivalent systems on Microsoft Azure.

entry.title: Ingest FAA SWIM content to analyze flight data
entry.summary: Learn how to integrate Chef Infra, Chef InSpec, Test Kitchen, Terraform, Terraform Cloud, and GitHub Actions to automate and create data analytics environments.

entry.title: Protect backend APIs in Azure
entry.summary: See an architecture that protects backend APIs by using API Management and Azure AD B2C to validate bearer tokens. The APIs can be in Azure or other environments.

entry.title: Move archive data from mainframe systems to Azure
entry.summary: Learn about a reference architecture that shows how to move data from mainframe and midrange systems to Azure.

entry.title: Scenarios that feature Microsoft on-premises technologies on Azure
entry.summary: Review a list of architectures and solutions that use Microsoft on-premises technologies on Microsoft Azure.

entry.title: Microsoft partner and third-party scenarios on Azure
entry.summary: Review an extensive list of architectures and solutions that use Microsoft partner and third-party solutions.

entry.title: Use platform as a service (PaaS) options
entry.summary: Understand the difference between infrastructure as a service (IaaS) and platform as a service (PaaS). Learn how to swap IaaS components for PaaS solutions.

entry.title: DataOps for the modern data warehouse
entry.summary: How to apply DevOps principles to data pipelines built according to the modern data warehouse (MDW) architectural pattern with Microsoft Azure.

entry.title: Modern analytics architecture with Azure Databricks
entry.summary: Create a modern analytics architecture with Azure Databricks, Data Lake Storage, and other Azure services. Unify data, analytics, and AI workloads at any scale.

entry.title: Data lakes
entry.summary: Learn about data lake storage repositories, which can hold terabytes and petabytes of data in native, raw format.

entry.title: Secure research environment for regulated data
entry.summary: Architecture on Azure that shows a regulated environment for researchers to access sensitive data while providing a higher level of control and data protection.

entry.title: Migrate a web app using Azure APIM
entry.summary: In this scenario, an e-commerce company in the travel industry migrates a legacy web application by using Azure API Management.

entry.title: Web app private connectivity to Azure SQL Database
entry.summary: Lock down access to an Azure SQL Database with Azure Private Link connectivity from a multi-tenant Azure App Service through regional VNet Integration.

entry.title: Basic web application
entry.summary: Learn about proven practices for deploying web applications that use Azure App Service and Azure SQL Database.

entry.title: Decentralized trust between banks
entry.summary: Establish a trusted environment for communication and information sharing without resorting to a centralized database.

entry.title: Healthcare platform confidential computing
entry.summary: Use confidential computing and containers to support a provider-hosted application. Securely collaborate with a hospital and a diagnostic provider.

entry.title: Computer forensics chain of custody in Azure
entry.summary: Create an infrastructure and workflow to ensure a valid digital evidence chain of custody (CoC) for computer forensics in Azure.

entry.title: Hybrid security monitoring with Microsoft Sentinel
entry.summary: Use Microsoft Defender for Cloud and Microsoft Sentinel to monitor the security configuration and telemetry of on-premises and Azure operating system workloads.

entry.title: Risk grid computing in banking
entry.summary: Presents the business considerations of implementing risk grid computing in banking on Azure.

entry.title: Risk grid computing solution
entry.summary: Introduces technical aspects of implementing Azure Batch for risk grid computing in banking.

entry.title: Choose an Internet of Things (IoT) solution in Azure
entry.summary: Use Azure IoT Central or individual Azure platform-as-a-service (PaaS) components to build, deploy, and manage internet-of-things (IoT) solutions.

entry.title: Modern data warehouse for small and medium business
entry.summary: Use Azure Synapse Analytics, SQL Database, and Data Lake Storage to modernize SMB legacy and on-premises data. Easily integrate fused data with other services.

entry.title: Introduction to predictive maintenance in manufacturing
entry.summary: Overview of how to develop predictive maintenance (PdM) for manufacturing customers on Azure.

entry.title: High availability and disaster recovery for IaaS apps
entry.summary: Learn about high-availability (HA) and disaster recovery (DR) options when deploying multitier infrastructure-as-a-service (IaaS) apps to Azure.

entry.title: Use Application Gateway Ingress Controller (AGIC) with a multitenant Azure Kubernetes Service
entry.summary: Learn how to use the Application Gateway Ingress Controller (AGIC) with your Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster to expose microservice-based applications to the internet.

entry.title: Digital image-based modeling on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to perform image-based modeling on Azure infrastructure-as-a-service (IaaS) by following the architecture and design guidance in an example scenario.

entry.title: 3D video rendering
entry.summary: Use Azure Batch to manage existing Windows or Linux applications, including Autodesk Maya and Blender, to run large-scale 3D video render jobs.

entry.title: Migrate your e-commerce solution to Azure
entry.summary: This article explains the phases of migrating ecommerce infrastructure from on premises to Azure.

entry.title: Live streaming digital media
entry.summary: This livestreaming solution captures video of interviews, conferences, sporting events, and other events in real time and broadcasts to consumers in real time.

entry.title: Facilities management powered by mixed reality and IoT
entry.summary: Improve uptime and operations in hospitality, manufacturing, and retail. Use mixed reality, IoT, and real-time data to digitally replicate your physical space.

entry.title: Population health management for healthcare
entry.summary: Use population health management to improve clinical and health outcomes and reduce costs. Track, monitor, and benchmark data with this tool.

entry.title: Create smart places by using Azure Digital Twins
entry.summary: Use Azure Digital Twins to create models of smart places from IoT device data. View and control products, systems, environments, and experiences.

entry.title: COVID-19 safe solutions with IoT Edge
entry.summary: Create a COVID-19 safe environment that monitors social distance, mask/PPE use, and occupancy requirements with CCTVs and Azure IoT Edge, Stream Analytics, and Machine Learning.

entry.title: Cognizant Safe Buildings with IoT and Azure
entry.summary: Deploy Cognizant Safe Buildings, IoT, and Azure services to protect buildings from COVID-19 outbreaks.

entry.title: UVEN smart and secure disinfection and lighting
entry.summary: BrainLit's UVEN system uses IoT and Azure Sphere to provide smart, safe, secure virus disinfection and healthy, human-optimized lighting.

entry.title: Health data consortium on Azure
entry.summary: Build a data consortium to share healthcare data among partners. Collect data from multiple sources. Share it with members in a secure and efficient way.

entry.title: Moodle deployment with Azure NetApp Files
entry.summary: Deploy Moodle with Azure NetApp Files for a resilient solution that offers high-throughput, low-latency access to scalable shared storage.

entry.title: Virtual health on Microsoft Cloud for Healthcare
entry.summary: This article describes an architecture to develop a virtual health solution using Microsoft Cloud for Healthcare.

entry.title: Data management in the retail industry
entry.summary: Retailors have large data stores of unused data from which they may gain valuable insights. This article discusses how Microsoft Azure can help effectively use that data.

entry.title: Visual search in retail with Azure Cosmos DB
entry.summary: This article explains the phases of migrating ecommerce infrastructure from on premises to Azure.

entry.title: Gaming using Azure Database for MySQL
entry.summary: Use Azure Database for MySQL for gaming solutions so that databases scale elastically with traffic bursts and deliver low-latency multi-player experiences.

entry.title: Gaming using Cosmos DB
entry.summary: Elastically scale your database to accommodate unpredictable bursts of traffic and deliver low-latency, multi-player experiences on a global scale.

entry.title: Azure Automation update management
entry.summary: Learn how to design a hybrid update management solution to manage updates on both Microsoft Azure and on-premises Windows and Linux computers.

entry.title: Build a speech-to-text transcription pipeline
entry.summary: Build an audio ingestion and speech-to-text transcription pipeline with Azure Cognitive Services. Speech recognition can be used for analyzing customer calls.

entry.title: Serverless web application
entry.summary: This reference architecture shows a serverless web application, which serves static content from Azure Blob Storage and implements an API using Azure Functions.

entry.title: Custom business processes
entry.summary: This example demonstrates how you can deploy portals that automate manual or paper-based processes and surface rich user experience.

entry.title: HIPAA and HITRUST compliant health data AI
entry.summary: Store, manage, and analyze HIPAA-compliant and HITRUST-compliant health data and medical records with the highest level of built-in security.

entry.title: Implement the Azure healthcare blueprint for AI
entry.summary: This article provides guidance for the Microsoft Azure blueprint for AI.

entry.title: Build a telehealth system on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to build a telehealth system, using Azure cloud services, that connects a professional healthcare organization to its remote patients.

entry.title: Run CFD simulations
entry.summary: Learn about running Computational Fluid Dynamics simulations using Azure. Create, manage, and optimize clusters using Azure CycleCloud.

entry.title: Advanced Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) microservices architecture
entry.summary: Learn about a scalable, secure AKS microservices architecture that builds on recommended AKS microservices baseline architectures and implementations.

entry.title: Campaign optimization with SQL Server
entry.summary: Optimize when and how to contact potential customers to improve marketing campaign success rates with machine learning and SQL Server 2016 with R Services.

entry.title: Oil and gas tank level forecasting
entry.summary: Tank level forecasting harnesses the power of real-time and historical data from sensors, meters, and records to prevent problems and reduce expenses.

entry.title: Predictive insights with vehicle telematics
entry.summary: Car dealerships, manufacturers, and insurance companies can use Microsoft Azure to gain predictive insights on vehicle health and driving habits.

entry.title: Image classification on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to build image processing into your applications by using Azure services such as the Computer Vision API and Azure Functions.

entry.title: Deploy AI and machine learning at the edge
entry.summary: Learn how to extend rapid machine learning inference from the cloud to on-premises and edge locations with Azure Stack Edge.

entry.title: Enterprise-grade conversational bot
entry.summary: Learn how to build a robust, secure, and actively learning bot (chatbot) using the Azure Bot Framework.

entry.title: Geospatial data processing and analytics
entry.summary: Collect, process, and store geospatial data by using managed Azure services. Make the data available through web apps. Visualize, explore, and analyze the data.

entry.title: Vision classifier model with Azure Custom Vision Cognitive Service
entry.summary: Create an image classifier with a solution architecture that includes Microsoft AirSim Drone simulator and Azure Custom Vision Cognitive Service.

entry.title: Extract actionable insights from IoT data
entry.summary: Extract insights from IoT data with Azure services.

entry.title: Anomaly detector process in near-real-time
entry.summary: Learn about Anomaly Detector and see how anomaly detection models are selected with time-series data.

entry.title: Centralized app configuration and security
entry.summary: Use Azure App Configuration and Azure Key Vault to create a centralized and secured configuration service for apps.

entry.title: Application integration using Azure Event Grid
entry.summary: Learn how to integrate your app with Azure Event Grid and take advantage of its reliable delivery, advanced routing, and direct integration.

entry.title: Knowledge mining in auditing, risk, and compliance management
entry.summary: Learn how to use knowledge mining to help attorneys quickly find information from discovery documents and flag important ideas across documents.

entry.title: Intelligent apps using Azure Database for MySQL
entry.summary: Use Azure Database for MySQL to develop sophisticated machine learning and visualization apps that provide analytics and information that you can act on.

entry.summary: Learn how to implement a hub-spoke topology in Azure, where the hub is a virtual network and the spokes are virtual networks that peer with the hub.

entry.summary: Learn how events, insights, and actions interact in internet-of-things (IoT) solutions.

entry.title: Disconnected AI at the edge with Azure Stack Hub
entry.summary: Harness the power of edge AI when disconnected from the internet and move your AI models to the edge with a solution architecture that includes Azure Stack Hub.

entry.title: Predictive aircraft engine monitoring
entry.summary: Demonstrates how to combine real-time aircraft data with analytics to create a solution for predictive aircraft engine monitoring and health.

entry.title: Azure Data Architecture Guide
entry.summary: Use proven customer engagement practices to design data-centric Azure solutions for traditional relational database workloads and big data architectures.

entry.title: Add a mobile front end to a legacy app
entry.summary: This solution consolidates data from multiple business systems and then surfaces the data through web and mobile front ends. This consolidation helps improve employee productivity and helps speed up decision making.

entry.title: Advanced analytics
entry.summary: This architecture allows you to combine any data at any scale with custom machine learning and get near real-time data analytics on streaming services.

entry.title: AI at the edge with Azure Stack Hub
entry.summary: Bring your trained AI model to the edge with Azure Stack Hub and integrate it with your applications for low-latency intelligence.

entry.summary: Create a movie recommendation system using machine learning and Azure Data Science Virtual Machine (DSVM) to train a model.

entry.summary: Aggregate customer data into complete profiles. Use advanced Azure machine learning models to provide predictive insights on simulated customers.

entry.title: Keyword search and speech-to-text with OCR digital media
entry.summary: Identify speech in static video files and manage it as standard content with this speech-to-text solution. Jump to video points that contain specific phrases.

entry.summary: Optimize big data marketing campaigns with a machine-learning model using Microsoft Machine Learning and Azure HDInsight Spark clusters.

entry.summary: Control IoT devices by using Azure Speech Service, Language Understanding Service (LUIS), and Azure Bot Service to create natural conversational interfaces.

entry.summary: See how solar-powered IoT devices combine with Azure services to deliver clean, low-cost power, light, and internet services to remote locations.

entry.summary: Run SWIFT Alliance Messaging Hub (AMH) on Azure. This messaging solution helps financial institutions to securely and efficiently bring new services to market.

entry.summary: Deploy the Magento e-commerce platform to Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), and learn about considerations for hosting Magento on Azure.

entry.title: Stream processing with Databricks
entry.summary: Learn how to create a four stage end-to-end stream processing pipeline in Azure using Azure Databricks.

entry.title: Build a real-time recommendation API on Azure
entry.summary: Use machine learning to automate recommendations using Azure Databricks and Azure Data Science Virtual Machines (DSVM) to train a model on Azure.

entry.title: Intelligent e-commerce product search engine
entry.summary: This example scenario shows how using a dedicated search service can dramatically increase the relevance of search results for your e-commerce customers.

entry.title: Protect APIs with Azure Application Gateway and Azure API Management
entry.summary: See how to protect APIs with API Management and Application Gateway.

entry.title: Speech services
entry.summary: Use Speech services to transcribe calls and then run full-text searches, detect sentiment and language, and create custom language and acoustic models.

entry.title: Camera selection for Azure IoT Edge vision AI
entry.summary: Get information about camera selection in an Azure IoT Edge vision solution. Explore camera features, camera placement, and the communication interface.

entry.title: Computer vision with Azure IoT Edge
entry.summary: Create a vision AI solution with Azure IoT Edge. Explore computer vision hardware, machine learning and storage requirements, alerting, and user interfaces.

entry.title: Machine learning in IoT Edge Vision
entry.summary: Learn about machine learning data and models in Azure IoT Edge vision AI solutions.

entry.title: Suggest content tags with NLP using deep learning
entry.summary: Use Microsoft AI to improve website content tagging accuracy by combining deep learning and natural language processing (NLP) with data on site-specific search terms.

entry.title: Pricing models for a multitenant solution
entry.summary: This article describes the considerations for planning pricing models for a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Real-time fraud detection
entry.summary: Analyze data in real time to detect fraudulent transactions or other anomalous activity, using Azure Event Hubs and Stream Analytics.

entry.title: Monitor a microservices app in AKS
entry.summary: Learn about best practices for monitoring a microservices application that runs on Azure Kubernetes Service, by collecting telemetry from the application.

entry.title: N-tier architecture style
entry.summary: Know the benefits, challenges, and best practices for N-tier architectures on Azure. An N-tier architecture splits an app into logical layers and physical tiers.

entry.title: End-to-end governance in Azure
entry.summary: When using CI/CD pipelines to automate deployments, apply RBAC not just on the ARM side, but also earlier in the process as developers check in their code.
